name: Abyssal Reinforcements
rules: Put an Abyssal ally token with 6 ATK / 6 health into play. Ongoing: Destroy two Bloods Put an Abyssal ally token with 6 ATK / 6 health into play. Use only on your turn.

name: Bathe in Blood
rules: Magtheridon deals 2 melee damage to target hero or ally.; If Magtheridon is Unleashed, gain a Blood.
flavour: My blood is my own! - Magtheridon

name: Blast Nova
rules: Flip Magtheridon's Lair.
flavour: You donâ€™t want to see what happensâ€¦ - Kana Nassis

name: Blindside
rules: Each raiding player removes his hand from the game. At the end of your next turn, put each card removed this way into its owner's hand.

name: Blood Siphon
rules: Ongoing: Destroy Blood Siphon -> Draw three cards.
flavour: As the channelers extract the blood of Magtheridon, the legion of fel orcs continues to grow.

name: Broken Hopes
rules: Ongoing: Destroy Broken Hopes -> Destroy target ability or equipment.
flavour: And I just sharpened it, too. - Fillet

name: Brush Aside
rules: Interrupt target ability, ally, or equipment card.; Magtheridon deals 1 melee damage to its controller's hero for each Blood in play.

name: Cleave Apart
rules: Destroy an ability, ready ally, and equipment controlled by target raiding player.

name: Dark Mending Channeler
rules: Dark Mending Channeler can attack only heroes and has +X ATK while attacking, where X is 1 plus the number of Warlocks that have left your party.; [Exhaust] -> Dark Mending Channeler heals all damage from target friendly ally. Use only on your turn.

name: Deadly Sweep
rules: For each raiding player, destroy up to one target ability, ally, or equipment he controls.

name: Demonic Fury
rules: Demonic Fury enters play exhausted.; Ongoing: [Exhaust] -> You pay 2 less to play your next card this turn.

name: Fel Ruination
rules: Play only of seven or more Bloods are in play.; Raiding players destroy an ability, ally, or equipment they control for each Blood in play.

name: Fiery Pits
rules: Raiding players put 15 damage divided as they choose on any number of heroes and/or allies in their parties, putting no more than fatal damage on each character.
flavour: Do not let the fiery pits consume you. - Mazar

name: Magtheridon
rules: FRONT: Untargetable; Magtheridon can't attack or be dealt damage.; When the last Channeler leaves your party or you place your fifth resource, flip Magtheridon.; BACK: When Magtheridon flips to this side, put five cubes into play, gain a Blood, and say, I am UNLEASHED! Put Magtheridon's Lair into play on the Coolsown side and swap this card with Unleashed Magtheridon.

name: Magtheridon
rules: FRONT: Magtheridon has +1 ATK while attacking for each Blood in play.; When the tenth Blood enters play, flip Magtheridon.; BACK: Magtheridon has +2 ATK while attacking for each Blood in play.

name: Magtheridon's Blood
rules: FRONT: Magtheridon has +1 ATK while attacking for each Blood in play.; When the tenth Blood enters play, flip Magtheridon.; BACK: Magtheridon has +2 ATK while attacking for each Blood in play.

name: Magtheridon's Lair
rules: FRONT: When Magtheridon's Lair flips to this side, put 2 damage on each hero and ally with an attached Cube, then detach all Cubes.; At the end of your turn, flip Magtheridon's Lair.; BACK: At the start of your turn, if one or more Cubes are unattached, Magtheridon deals 10 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally. At the end of your turn, flip Magtheridon's Lair.

name: Magtheridon's Rage
rules: Target an ally. You may target an additional ally for each Blood in play. Magtheridon deals X melee damage to each of those allies.
flavour: He conquered a world of orcs. Why did you think you would be a challenge?

name: Manticron Cube
rules: Exhaust a hero or ally in your party -> Attach this Cube to that character while that character remains exhausted. Only a raiding player can use this power, and only on his turn.

name: Mind Exhaustion
rules: Attach to target hero or ally, and Magtheridon deals 4 fire damage to it.

name: One Fell Swoop
rules: Play only if fifteen or more Bloods are in play.As an additional cost to play, exhaust Magtheridon.One Fel Swoop can't be interrupted.Magtheridon deals 30 melee damage to each opposing hero and ally.

name: Path of Ruin
rules: Choose a number. Destroy all opposing abilities, allies, and equipment with cost equal to that number.

name: Pit Lord's Armor
rules: Play only if Magtheridon is Unleashed.Destroy a Blood This turn, Magtheridon can't be targeted by raiding players, and your cards can't be interrupted.

name: Pit Lord's Glaive
rules: Play only if Magtheridon is Unleashed.When Magtheridon deals combat damage to a hero or ally, he also deals that much damage to a second target hero or ally.

name: Power Returns
rules: Draw a card for each Blood in play.Destroy a Blood Put Power Returns into your hand. Use only if Power Returns is in your graveyard.
flavour: My blood will be the end of you! - Magtheridon

name: Rampant Destruction
rules: Destroy an opposing ability or equipment for each Blood in play.When an opposing card or effect causes you to discard Rampant Destruction, you may put it from your graveyard into your hand.

name: Redouble Effort
rules: Ongoing: Ready Magtheridon. He can't attack the same hero more than once this turn.
flavour: How could anything so big move so fast? - Mazar

name: Sadistic Choice
rules: Reveal the top two cards of your deck. Target raiding player chooses whether you put them into your hand or graveyard. If he chooses the graveyard, draw two cards.
flavour: Never has there been a better definition of trying to choose between the lesser of two evils. - Moala Stonebinder

name: Shadow Channeler
rules: Shadow Channeler can attack only heroes and has +X ATK while attacking, where X is 1 plus the number of Warlocks that have left your party.3, Shadow Channeler deals 1 shadow damage to each hero and ally in target raiding player's party. Use only on your turn.

name: Shadow Channeler
rules: Shadow Channeler can attack only heroes and has +X ATK while attacking, where X is 1 plus the number of Warlocks that have left your party.3, Shadow Channeler deals 1 shadow damage to each hero and ally in target raiding player's party. Use only on your turn.

name: Sow Destruction
rules: Sow Destruction enters play with a curse counter for each Blood in play.Ongoing: At the start of your turn, put a curse counter on Sow Destruction, and then Magtheridon deals fire damage equal to the number of curse counters to the opposing hero with the least damage. You settle ties.

name: Spirit Wrench
rules: Play only if seven or more Bloods are in play.Remove all damage from target opposing hero and put it on a second target hero.
flavour: That's not the kind of healing I was hoping for. - Fillet

name: Squish Together
rules: Exhaust twp target opposing allies. Each deals melee damage equal to its ATK to the other ally.
flavour: Watch out for falling allies! - Ozzati

name: Summoner Channeler
rules: Summoner Channeler can attack only heroes and has +X ATK while attacking, where X is 1 plus the number of Warlocks that have left your party.3, Put an Abyssal ally token with 6 ATK / 6 health into play. Use only on your turn.

name: Summoner Channeler
rules: Shadow Channeler can attack only heroes and has +X ATK while attacking, where X is 1 plus the number of Warlocks that have left your party.3, Shadow Channeler deals 1 shadow damage to each hero and ally in target raiding player's party. Use only on your turn.

name: Swath of Destruction
rules: Play only if one or more Bloods are in play. Destroy target opposing ally, and its controller chooses a second raiding player. That player destroys one of his resources and chooses a third raiding player. That player discards a card.

name: Terrifying Presence
rules: Ongoing: Opposing allies enter play exhausted.Exhaust target ally.
flavour: The roar frightens away many before they even see what they're up against.

name: Toss About
rules: Play only if one or more Bloods are in play.
flavour: When the walls begin to shake, so will your confidence.

name: Trample Underfoot
rules: Magtheridon deals 2 melee damage to target hero or ally.Ongoing: When Magtheridon becomes exhausted, he deals 2 melee damage to target hero or ally.

name: Violent Reflex
rules: Ongoing: When Magtheridon is dealt damage, he deals 1 melee damage to the source of that damage.

name: Whiplash
rules: Exhaust an opposing ally for each card above seven in your hand.
flavour: There is no safe haven from Magtheridon's rage.

name: Will of the Legion
rules: Interrupt target ability, ally, or equipment card.
flavour: Vermin! Leeches! Take my blood and choke on it! - Magtheridon
